meanings.definition: To lecture or teach formally before a class or audience.
meanings.sent1: The professor was praelecting the students on the importance of time management.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys praelecting on various topics to engage her students.
meanings.sent3: The cat was praelecting the kittens on the art of catching mice.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl praelecting the young owlets on the ways of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The coach praelecting the team on the strategies for winning the game was inspiring.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a lecture or teaching a subject in advance.
meanings.sent1: Attending the praelecting helped the students prepare for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent2: The praelecting provided valuable insights into the upcoming course material.
meanings.sent3: The praelecting session was so informative that the students couldn't wait for the actual class.
meanings.sent4: The praelecting was like a sneak peek into the world of advanced mathematics.
meanings.sent5: The professor's praelecting was so engaging that it left a lasting impression on the students.
